title: Shaco Cosplay
body:
Hey guys, I wanted to cosplay Shaco in near future.
I've already got a plan but would appreciate to know if I missed something and also I need your help :33

First of, I found an Uniform I could use for Shaco it may not look too beautiful on the pic but I saw it on some pics where it has been also used on and it looks really good irl! ( http://www.aliexpress.com/item/LOL-Shaco-Cosplay-costume-custom-made/32598119470.html?spm=2114.40010208.4.18.FA6jiV )

For his mask I'd use a plaster roll. I can find them in my shop so no links for that.

I didn't really know what to use for his daggers but a lot of people seem to use Craft Foam for Katarina's daggers so I think I'll use that for Shaco. I can also find them in a shop in my city so again no links for that.

The problem here is I need Shaco's Arm&knee pads but I basicially cant find them. I am also not too talented with creating them on my own so I thought of buying them. Does anyone of you guys know where I could buy them?

If I missed smth on my cosplay please tell me!
